Key Match Events: The Tigers were down 5-0 in the first inning and failed to recover
Tyler Holton failed to record an out and Reese Olson gave up a three-run homer to Lane Thomas in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers came in feeling confident after going 31-13 since Aug. 11 to earn a postseason berth
Others: A.J. Hinch's decision to not use a traditional starter in Game 1 backfired
Tanner Bibee pitched well for the Guardians
The Tigers hitters struck out 13 times
Detroit didn't get a runner past first over the final five innings
